00045 class MESQUITE_EXPORT PointDomain : public MeshDomain
00046 {
00047   private:
00048     Vector3D mGeom;
00049   
00050   public:
00051     
00052     PointDomain( const Vector3D& location ) : mGeom(location) {}
00053 
00054     const Vector3D& geom() const { return mGeom; }
00055     
00056      
00057     virtual void snap_to(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
00058                          Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00059     
00060     virtual void vertex_normal_at(Mesh::VertexHandle entity_handle,
00061                                   Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00062     virtual void element_normal_at(Mesh::ElementHandle entity_handle,
00063                                   Vector3D &coordinate) const;
00064                           
00065     virtual void vertex_normal_at( const Mesh::VertexHandle* handles,
00066                                    Vector3D coordinates[],
00067                                    unsigned count,
00068                                    MsqError& err ) const;
00069                             
00070     virtual void closest_point( Mesh::VertexHandle handle,
00071                                 const Vector3D& position,
00072                                 Vector3D& closest,
00073                                 Vector3D& normal,
00074                                 MsqError& err ) const;
00075                                 
00076     virtual void domain_DoF( const Mesh::VertexHandle* handle_array,
00077                              unsigned short* dof_array,
00078                              size_t num_handles,
00079                              MsqError& err ) const;
00080 };

00083 {
00084   private:
00085     MsqLine mGeom;
